commit.message:
Rollup merge of #67877 - dtolnay:const-_, r=nagisa Omit underscore constants from rustdoc Underscore constants from https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2526 / https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/54912 do not correspond to a nameable item and so are never useful in documentation.
#### Before: >        #### After: > Not that.
